original_text: In like manner shalt thou do with his ass; and so shalt thou do with his raiment; and with all lost thing of thy brother's, which he hath lost, and thou hast found, shalt thou do likewise: thou mayest not hide thyself.
korean_text: 나귀라도 그리하고 의복이라도 그리하고 형제가 잃어버린 어떤 것이든지 네가 얻거든 다 그리하고 못 본 체하지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: In like manner shalt thou do with his ass
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그의 나귀에게도 그와 같이 행하고

sentences.original_text: and so shalt thou do with his raiment
and with all lost thing of thy brother's
sentences.korean_translation: 네 형제의 잃어버린 모든 것에 대하여도

sentences.original_text: which he hath lost, and thou hast found
